name: Space Rocks (itch) (MorphAll)
description:
THE PLAYABLE VERSION ABOVE IS NOT PERFECT, PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE GAME TO PLAY IT AS INTENDED THE GAME

It's time to break some space rocks !

Select your bullet type between Rock, Paper or Scissors to destroy the asteroids. Choose carefully as they have strengths and weaknesses !

THE CONTROLS

Movement : ARROW KEYS (UP - DOWN - LEFT - RIGHT)

Shoot : SPACE

Switch Bullet Type : A/Q - D

Pause : ALT

Made in Unity 2019.3.8f in 3 days (20/06 -> 23/06)

For the Weekly Game Jam 154 : Rock, Paper, Scissors

& THE CREDITS

MorphAll - Programming, Design and Art

THANKS TO

Nogus
